title: Google exec “feels bad for iPhone users” not being able to use RCS
description: Google says it doesn't want RCS to replace other message apps, it just wants RCS to be a better default than SMS.

title: Very rare price drop on the PlayStation 5 in this bundle deal
description: There's $50 off the PS5 with God of War Ragnarok for the first time ever.

title: New Nothing earbuds spotted in listing and they look a little nutty
description: The earbuds are a big departure from Nothing's other earbud offerings.

title: AliExpress’ new CHOICE offering makes shopping easier than ever
description: AliExpress, one of the world's top marketplaces, announced the launch of its new AliExpress CHOICE offering in the US.

title: Daily Authority: 🔥 New foldable in town plus some Friday fun!
description: HUAWEI brings the heat with new flagships, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 leaks, and more tech news you need to read.

title: It’s official: The ASUS ROG Phone 7 is coming soon
description: Expect a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, ultra-high refresh rate screen, and capacitive shoulder triggers.

title: First Fold, then Flip, now Samsung could launch a Tri-Fold in 2023
description: A tri-folding device could join the Fold and Flip form factors this year, according to a leaker.

title: Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor leaks: A 64-bit-only powerhouse?
description: Qualcomm might drop yet another little CPU core in favor of more horsepower.
